1.title: Shoot & Score
1.plot: On your marks, get set.... get snappin! The competitors capture their love of one of the hottest sports as they step into the shoes of pro soccer photographers!

2.title: Making A Splash
2.plot: Get ready to dive into to some splashy snappin! The photographers discover how to master the art of timing as they capture all the fun of an amazing soaker at a water park!

3.title: The World Up Close
3.plot: Mother Nature is ready for her close up! The competitors must learn what makes an awesome shot with Mother Nature as their amazing subject!

4.title: Flashing Lights
4.plot: Work it, vogue it, snap it! There's more to an amazing photo than just pressing the shutter button. In this challenge, the photographers step into the shoes of a studio photographer as they direct a model in a fun, glamorous and attitude-filled photo shoot!

5.title: Catch Me In Action
5.plot: Hold onto your cameras! In this episode, the photographers will experience firsthand all of the skill that goes into creating a high-impact action shot!

6.title: We Can Be Comic Book Heroes
6.plot: Snapshots - the super show that's saving the world from bad photos! In this episode, the photographers rocket into the fantastical world of comic books with their lenses!

imdb.plot outline: Snapshots is an unscripted live-action photography competition series where kids compete to take the best photo ever. In each episode, three kids go head-to-head, putting their speed, skills and creativity to the test in two epic picture-snapping challenges. Expert photographers judge their photos, but only one of them can be named the winner of Snapshots.
imdb.title: Snapshots
plot: _Snapshots_ (qv) is an unscripted live-action photography competition series where kids compete to take the best photo ever. In each episode, three kids go head-to-head, putting their speed, skills and creativity to the test in two epic picture-snapping challenges. Expert photographers judge their photos, but only one of them can be named the winner of _Snapshots_ (qv).
